Location.name: TownCenter
Location.description: You have entered the town center
Location.inspect: What used to be a lively town, is dead silent

Location.name: Hospital
Location.inspect: Hospitals used to make you nervous and now you are even more so by its silence

Location.name: PoliceStation
Location.description: You have entered the Police Station. You see a desk by the front door and jail cells to the back.
Location.inspect: O oooo its the popo place

Location.name: Store
Location.description: You have entered the Store. Aisles are lined with grocery items.

Location.name: School
Location.inspect: And they said you'd never go back to school. Pffft.. look at them now... DEAD!

Location.name: Road 1
Location.description: You have entered a road. You see a stick on the ground.
Location.inspect: Tis just a typical road. You should go North

Location.name: Road 2
Location.inspect: Another typical road. Again should go North

Location.name: Road 3
Location.inspect: Why so many roads!!!!! Screw it! GO NORTH!!!

Location.name: Road 4
Location.inspect: ROADS! ROADS! ROADS! ROADS! ROADS! AND MORE ROADS!
